description:
Bankers Toolbox never sleeps on crime.
We're starting to learn that someone is running a major crime ring in the area.
Help us figure out who it is, how they're pulling it off, and where they're doing it - All with the power of BAM+ Clue!

1.info: Rumor has it Martin has been spending a lot of time at the Casino lately.. He says he and his crew have been winning big!

2.info: Some are dirty, some are nice, better watch out for that faulty card reader - or it'll take your money twice.

3.info: OMG! Did you know there are websites were you can buy designer labels for 75% off?! The only catch is there isn't one of those little "lock" icons in the URL.

4.info: "Come dirty - leave clean" is their motto. Liz says she frequently visits the car wash after a long Sunday drive.

5.info: Will always pays very close attention when people talk about the Dark Web.. Almost too close.

6.info: Liz is always jumpy when we talk about rules and regulations.. And she never says a word about her personal life, other than she loves driving with the windows down so she can feel the wind run through her hair.

7.info: Desk mate Christina B. reports Martin receives a lot of calls.. and usually speaks in hushed tones while rushing out of the room.

8.info: This money smells a little funky.. And it was carried into the Casino in a duffle bag.

9.info: Oh man.. Your boss is on vacation and needs a $12,000 wire transfer right now.

10.info: Seems like all of Sara's checks have been rerouted through the wrong treasury lately..

11.info: Hmm.. Martha deposits 3 checks a week.. all just under $10,000.

12.info: Their manicure equipment may be clean, but they may be hiding dirty money. Give yourself a hand if you can cross this one off the list..

13.info: Need a social security card? Drugs? Bank accounts? Credit cards? A hit man? We've got it all.

14.info: You were low on cash and had to use that sketchy looking ATM.. you've got your money, but now they've got your info!

15.info: The only way to buy anything on the Dark Web.

16.info: Seems like this year Sara's kids have a different fundraiser every week.. $20 seems a bit high for a box of Girl Scout Cookies.

17.info: Michelle has a passion for fashion! Specifically she likes talking about her 24-hour nail salon, which reports the highest volume of cash flow at 3 AM...

18.info: Christina uses her innocence to her advantage.. Sara and Will always seem to be waiting on her hand and foot.

19.info: Martha is the newest addition to the RM team. Her constant chatter about "how to make a quick buck" through mortgage purchasing have us questioning this Southern Belle.

tasks.name: Stop by Professional Services
tasks.desc: Visit the Professional Services table to pick up your secret message.

quiz.question: What secret image is on the document you received from the Professional Services Table?

tasks.name: Who is your Account Manager?
tasks.desc: Banker's Toolbox started a new position this year, Account Manager. Your Account Manager is your advocate within the support function of Banker's Toolbox. You'll need to find them to get the answer to your next clue...

quiz.question: What is your account managers favorite wine?

tasks.name: Rock and Roll
tasks.desc: Rotel and the Hot Tomatoes will be jamming at the Customer Appreciation Dinner. Take special note of their first song. You'll need it to unveil your next clue!

quiz.question: What decade was Rotel and the Hot Tomatoes first song from on Wednesday night? (Answer in the form of ##'s)

tasks.name: Beneficial Ownership Ruling
tasks.desc: We have been talking about CDD/Beneficial Ownership a lot during BUG.. Now let's review how can Banker's Toolbox help you prepare.

quiz.question: Which of the following is true about Due Diligence Manager?
answers: Allows you to compare expected vs actual transaction history
Integrates with Financial Institutions' current account opening programs and procedures
Compliant with FinCEN's new CDD Rule

tasks.name: Thought Leadership Webinars
tasks.desc: These free monthly webinars are an easy way to earn your continuing education credits!

quiz.question: Which of these is a webinar Banker's HAS NOT done?

tasks.name: Banker's Toolbox has a new product!
tasks.desc: Recently Banker's Toolbox released a tool called Relationship Manager, which brings business intelligence to Banking.

quiz.question: What functionalities does Relationship Manager have?
answers: Helps predict when a customer will close an account
Helps front line staff know what and when to cross sell to customers

tasks.name: Regional User Group
tasks.desc: Regional User Groups are a great way to stay involved all year! Have you signed up for yours?

quiz.question: What Regional User Group are you a part of? (If you are not active in your Regional User Group, please pick the Regional User Group you are most likely to attend.)
quiz.multiQuestion: What city does your Regional User Group meet?

tasks.name: Survey Says...
tasks.desc: Banker's Toolbox values your opinion. Think back to this year's survey for the next clue.

quiz.question: Banker's Toolbox sends a customer satisfaction survey twice a year. What is the only question within that survey?
answers: On a scale of 1-10 how likely are you to recommend Banker's Toolbox to a colleague or friend?
What is your favorite Banker's Toolbox product?
How long have you been a Banker's Toolbox customer?
Who is your favorite Banker's Toolbox employee?
quiz.answer: On a scale of 1-10 how likely are you to recommend Banker's Toolbox to a colleague or friend?

tasks.name: Hotel Mystery
tasks.desc: Kimpton Hotels pride themselves in customizing each hotel to match the culture of the city that  they reside in. For this next clue, you will need to dig deep into Rainey Street's history...

quiz.question: What animal is Geraldine's, the restaurant in Hotel Van Zandt, named after?

tasks.name: Connect with your RM
tasks.desc: Your Relationship Manager is your strategic partner in your (and your financial institution's) success. Get to know them a little better to uncover this next clue.

quiz.question: What is your Relationship Manager's favorite food?

tasks.name: Stopping Fraud in its Tracks
tasks.desc: Watch this brief video on Banker's Toolbox fraud solutions for this next clue!

quiz.question: How much money did bankers lose last year in ACH, wire, and debit card fraud? (Hint: watch the fraud video on the Banker's Toolbox website (http://www.bankerstoolbox.com/solutions/fraud/)

tasks.name: Achieving the Impossible
tasks.desc: Motivational Speaker, Alison Levine will help you uncover this next clue on Friday morning.

quiz.question: Who sponsored the first women's expedition to Mount Everest?

tasks.name: The ACH Challenge
tasks.desc: ACH isn't confusing at all, come learn what its all about!

quiz.question: What is another word for ACH fraud?

tasks.name: Banker's Toolbox Blog
tasks.desc: Reading the Banker's Toolbox blog is a great way to stay up-to-date industry news and more. Have you been keeping up?

quiz.question: What is the most recent blog post on our website?
answers: Meet our SARS -- Support, Account Managers, Relationship Managers
Four Tips for Delivering a Dynamic Training

quiz.question: What is Wayne's favorite TV Show?

tasks.name: Banker's Toolbox is expanding!
tasks.desc: This year, Banker's Toolbox acquired Integra Systems. Test your knowledge about our new product suite.

quiz.question: Which of the following is true about Integra Systems?
answers: Bankers Toolbox acquired the company in February 2017
Their product suite includes IQ AutoScan
IQ AutoScan is a file scanning software
